  • Constructor Details

    • GameWeaponItem

      public GameWeaponItem​(String name, char displayChar, int damage, String verb, int hitRate, int price)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the item
      displayChar - character to use for display when item is on the ground
      damage - amount of damage this weapon does
      verb - verb to use for this weapon, e.g. "hits", "zaps"
      hitRate - the probability/chance to hit the target.
